Action: The action intended by calling this API
CourseReferenceNumber:
Internal Course Reference Number - SSG-generated unique reference number for the course
Example of Internal Course References Number: TGS-12345678
CourseRegistrationDateOpen:
Opening Registration Date should not be later than Closing Registration Date
Example: 20210617(YYYYMMDD)
CourseRegistrationDateClose:
Closing Registration Date should not be earlier than Opening Registration Date
Example: 20210621(YYYYMMDD)
CourseStartDate:
Course Start Date should not be earlier than Opening/Closing Registration Dates 
Example: 20210628(YYYYMMDD)
CourseEndDate:
Course End Date should not be earlier than Opening/Closing Registration Dates
Example: 20210628(YYYYMMDD)
CourseVacCode:
Indication of the Course vacancy information code 
Example: 01
CourseVacDescription:
Indication of the Course vacancy information code 
Example: Description
CourseRunId:
The Course Run Id is used as a URL for GET Request Call
Example: https://api.ssg-wsg.sg/courses/runs/{runId}
conferringInstitute: UEN/branch code of the supporting assessment TP for the results. If left blank, the trainingPartner.code is set as the default value.
collectionStatus: Status of the trainee's or employer's payment of the course fees to the training partner
discountAmount: Amount of discount the training partner is deducting from course fees
EnrolRefNum:
Indication of the Reference Number generated during the creation of Enrolment.
Example:ENR-2003-123456
enrolmentStatus: Status of the trainee's of the enrolment to the course
ExternalCourseReferenceNumber:
External Course Reference Number -SSG-generated unique reference number for the course
Example of External Course References Number: TGS-12345678
Floor:
Information of Floor is required if Mode of training is not 2 or 4.
Example: 15
field: Field to sort by. Available fields -updatedOn, -createdOn. Will default to updatedOn if null
Grade: The letter grade of the assessment, entered as A-F, if applicable
InfoTypeCode:
Indication of the Course run schedule info code 
Example: 01
InfoTypeDescription:
Indication of the the description of Course run schedule info 
Example: Description
IntakeSize: Indication of the maximum pax for a class. Example: 50
lastUpdateDateTo:
Optional parameter. This will return records up till the specified date. Format YYYY-MM-DD
 Example: 2020-02-01
lastUpdateDateFrom:
Mandatory if retrieveType is DELTA. This will return records with last update date same or greater than this input value. Format YYYY-MM-DD.
Example: 2020-01-01
ModeOfTraining:
Indication the type of training conducted 
Example: 2 - Asynchronous eLearning
NumberOfHours: No of Hours or duration on the session attended. Range from 0.5 - 8.0. The field is mandatory only for "On-the-Job" Mode of Training.
RegisteredUserCount:
Indication of course run registered user count. This number cannot be more than intakeSize + threshold
Example: 60
Room:
Information of Room is required if Mode of training is not 2 or 4.
Example: 24
order: Sort order. Ascending - asc, Descending - desc. Will default to desc if null
PostalCode:
Information of Postal Code is required if Mode of training is not 2 or 4.
Example: 123455
PrimaryVenue:
Indication if the course session location is Primary Venue. If the value is true, API will pick the venue information from course run and update to session venue.
Example: true
Phone: Country Code* - Area Code - Phone Number*
page: Page number of page displayed, starting from 0
pageSize: The number of items to be displayed on one page.
Result: The outcome of the assessment, specified as pass, fail or exempt
ScheduleInfo:
Indication of the Course run schedule info 
Example: Sat / 5 Sats / 9am - 6pm
SessionId:
Indication of the ID of the session
 Eg: TGS-2020000703-224596-S1
SessionMonth:
Indication of the Month of the session
 Eg: 112021
SessionStartDate:
Start Date should not be later than End Date 
Example: 20210616(YYYYMMDD)
SessionStartTime:
Start time should not be later than End Time if session is on the same day.
Example: 17:30 (HH:MM)
SessionEndDate:
End Date should not be earlier than Start Date 
Example: 20210621(YYYYMMDD)
SessionEndTime:
End time should not be earlier than Start Time if session is on the same day.
Example: 18:30 (HH:MM)
skillCode: The competency or skill code assessed for the course, derived from the course data in the Training Partners Gateway
Score: The numerical score or percentage score of the assessment, entered as a whole number, if applicable
SponsorshipType: Sponsorship type for the course enrolment
status: Status of enrolment records to be searched
SurveyLanguage: Survey Language used for sending out the survey.
TrainerCode:
Indication whether the trainer is a new or existing trainer

Example: 1 - Existing
TrainerID:
Indication of the unique Trainer id for existing trainer. For new trainer, leave it blank. 
Example: 123
TrainerLinkedlnURL:
Indication of trainer linkedin URL (optional). For existing trainer, leave this field empty
Example: https://sg.linkedin.com/company/linkedin/abc
TrainerSalutationID:
Indication of the salutation of trainer. For existing trainer, leave this field empty
Example: 1(Mr)
TrainerAreaOfPractice:
Indication of the Key Domain / Sector Areas of Practice of the trainer (required for new trainer). For existing trainer, leave this field empty
example: Testing Management in Computer Application
inTrainingProviderProfile:
Indicate whether to add the new trainer information to Training Provider's Profile.
Example: true
TrainerssecDescription:
Indication of the description of the linked ssec-EQA
Example: EQA test 4
TpCode: Code for the training partner conducting the course for which the trainee is enrolled
TraineeId:
Trainee's government-issued ID number
 Example S1234567H
Threshold:
Indication of any additional pax that can register above maximum pax. If threshold = 10, Total allowed registration pax is intakeSize + threshold = 60
Example: 60
UEN: UEN of the training partner organisation conducting the course for which the trainee is enrolled
Unit:
Information of Unit is required if Mode of training is 2 not or 4.
Example: 001
WheelChairAccess:
Indication if the course run location is wheel chair accessible
Example: true
